languages.text: "Славн{mf|ый|ая}, послуш{mf|ный|ная} звер{mf|ек|ушка}..." {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Я найду способ просветить тебя... и получить от этого удовольствие".
"My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."
languages.original_text: "Славн{mf|ый|ая}, послуш{mf|ный|ная} звер{mf|ек|ушка}..." {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Я найду способ просветить тебя... и получить от этого удовольствие".

traits.locale_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."

traits.locale_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Mi buena mascotita obediente...». {n}Marazhai te mira con ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «Encontraré la forma de ilustrarte... y de disfrutar con tu educación».
languages.original_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."

traits.locale_text: «Mi buena mascotita obediente...». {n}Marazhai te mira con ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «Encontraré la forma de ilustrarte... y de disfrutar con tu educación».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我听话的小宠物……”{n}玛拉斋垂着双眼，看着你。{/n}“我会想办法指导你的……调教你一定会让我乐在其中。”
languages.original_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."

traits.locale_text: “我听话的小宠物……”{n}玛拉斋垂着双眼，看着你。{/n}“我会想办法指导你的……调教你一定会让我乐在其中。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺の従順な可愛いペット…」{n}マラズハイは下げたまぶたの下からあなたを見つめる。{/n}「教えてやろう…そして、楽しませてもらうとしよう」
languages.original_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の従順な可愛いペット…」{n}マラズハイは下げたまぶたの下からあなたを見つめる。{/n}「教えてやろう…そして、楽しませてもらうとしよう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Gentil petit|Gentille petite} esclave... » {n}Marazhai vous regarde par-dessous ses paupières mi-closes.{/n} « Je trouverai bien un moyen de vous éclairer... et de prendre plaisir à vous instruire. »
languages.original_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Gentil petit|Gentille petite} esclave... » {n}Marazhai vous regarde par-dessous ses paupières mi-closes.{/n} « Je trouverai bien un moyen de vous éclairer... et de prendre plaisir à vous instruire. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Mein braves, gehorsames kleines Haustier ..." {n}Marazhai blickt dich mit gesenkten Augenlidern an.{/n} "Ich werde einen Weg finden, Euch zu erleuchten ... und Gefallen an Eurer Ausbildung zu finden."
languages.original_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."

traits.locale_text: "Mein braves, gehorsames kleines Haustier ..." {n}Marazhai blickt dich mit gesenkten Augenlidern an.{/n} "Ich werde einen Weg finden, Euch zu erleuchten ... und Gefallen an Eurer Ausbildung zu finden."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."

languages.text: "Güzel, sadık köpeğim benim..." {n}Marazhai, düşük göz kapaklarının ardından sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bir şekilde zihnini açacağım... Eğitiminden büyük haz alacağım."
languages.original_text: "My good, obedient little pet..." {n}Marazhai looks at you from beneath his lowered lids.{/n} "I will find a way to enlighten you... and to take pleasure in your education."
